remarks: The value of the ring homomorphism ` F ` .  (Contributed by AV, 22-Dec-2019.)
statement:
scmatrhmval.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
scmatrhmval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
scmatrhmval.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) $.
scmatrhmval.t $e |- .* = ( .s ` A ) $.
scmatrhmval.f $e |- F = ( x e. K |-> ( x .* .1. ) ) $.
scmatrhmval $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ X e. K ) -> ( F ` X ) = ( X .* .1. ) ) $.
$d .* x $.
$d .1. x $.
$d K x $.
$d R x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
